revised_title: Oogenesis in Hymenoptera: A Study on Synapsis and Chromosome Behavior
tldr: This study investigates oogenesis in Hymenoptera, focusing on synapsis and chromosome behavior. The author examines the process of differentiation in oocytes and nurse cells, as well as the role of synapsis in sex determination. The research provides insights into the complex mechanisms of oogenesis in these insects.
